publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2427# Marilyn Livingstone: Maggie's Cancer Centre Charity-That the Parliament recognises, welcomes and supports the Maggie's Cancer Centre charity, founded by Maggie Keswick Jencks in 1996, for its work in providing extra medical care, support and assistance to cancer sufferers, their families and friends and which seeks to ensure that cancer sufferers are as healthy in mind and body as possible, by enabling them to participate actively in the treatment of their disease and to share their experiences with other sufferers; considers that the Scottish Executive should actively promote the development of Maggie's Centres throughout Scotland, and wishes the campaign to develop a Maggie's Centre in Kirkcaldy every success.
S1M-2427# Maggie's Cancer Centre Charity (lodged on 8 November 2001) Mr Keith Raffan*, Margaret Smith*
S1M-2427# Maggie's Cancer Centre Charity (lodged on 8 November 2001) Tommy Sheridan*, Karen Whitefield*
